text: Lophioturris is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Turridae, the turrids. ==Species== Species within the genus Lophioturris include: * Lophioturris indica (Deshayes, 1833) * Lophioturris indica (Röding, 1798) * Lophioturris leucotropis (Adams & Reeve, 1850) * Lophioturris polytropus (Helbling, 1779) ==References== Category:Turridae
title: Lophioturris
